```{r message=TRUE, warning=TRUE}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(scales)
theme_set(theme_light())
options(scipen = 999)

immigration_flow <- read_csv("oecd_immigration-flow_full.csv") %>% clean_names()
```

# Total of # of immigrants in 2016
```{r}
immigration_flow %>% 
  filter(time == 2016) %>%
  group_by(location) %>% 
  summarize(total = sum(value)) %>%
  ungroup() %>% 
  mutate(location = fct_reorder(location, total)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(location, total)) +
  geom_col() +
  coord_flip() +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma_format()) +
  labs(x = "", 
       y = "")

```

```{r}
immigration_flow %>% 
  filter(location %in% c("JPN", "KOR"), 
         time >= 2000) %>% 
  group_by(location, time) %>% 
  summarize(total = sum(value)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(time, total, color = location)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line()
```
